https://store.steampowered.com/app/1820050/

About the Game



A girl was handed over to the kobolds because she remained silent about her companions.
‚ÄúIf the mouth on the top won't open, then we'll have to start with the other mouth...‚Äù
You have seven days to find a way to get her to open her mouth.
Will her mouth open first, or will she get pregnant first‚Ä¶?



‚óÜGameplay Instructions


As you torture her body, the adjustable parameters will also change.
Use aphrodisiacs or inject her body with a lot of white, cloudy fluid.
In addition, you can unlock customized appearances after you have completed the levels.
Try to collect all the endings!

‚óÜGame Features

„ÉªAdjustable breast and buttocks size
„ÉªSuper realistic breast and buttocks shaking
„ÉªCustomizable hair color and clothing
„ÉªCan operate several kobolds
„ÉªWhite turbidity mode (let her be covered in white fluid!)
„ÉªFertilization function
„ÉªCamera mode (login, call, auto play function)
„ÉªMultiple endings
„ÉªNew position and appearance customization function with the number of endings unlocked

data.short_description: ‚ÄúIf the mouth on the top won't open, then we'll have to start with the other mouth...‚Äù You have seven days to find a way to get her to open her mouth. Will her mouth open first, or will she get pregnant first‚Ä¶? This is a 3D+ simulation game!
data.supported_languages:
Japanese*, English, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Korean, Turkish
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: WIN7 SP1/WIN8/WIN10/XP
  • Processor: 1.2 GHz
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9 compatible graphics card
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 512 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: WIN7 SP1/WIN8/WIN10/XP
  • Processor: 1.2 GHz
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9 compatible graphics card
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

content_descriptors.notes:
This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work . The game contains Nudity or sexual acts , extreme violence, sexual assault , non-consensual sex, drug abuse , General Mature Content.
All characters are over the age of 20.
